docs.snippet: Viacom’s investment in the company, which produces concerts and festivals aimed at teenagers, is a bid to stay relevant to a generation of social networking, online-streaming viewers....

docs.abstract: Viacom buys minority stake in live entertainment company DigiTour Media, whose concerts and events are aimed at teenage audiences.

docs.snippet: Two day care workers accused of instigating scuffles among young children as part of what one compared to the movie "Fight Club" pleaded not guilty Friday to child abuse charges....

docs.snippet: Two former employees at a New Jersey daycare center are accused of encouraging fights among young children, calling it a "fight club" and recording the clashes on video, prosecutors said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two former employees at a New Jersey daycare center are accused of encouraging fights among young children, calling it a "fight club" and recording the clashes on video, prosecutors said on Tuesday.

headline.main: New Jersey Daycare Ex-Workers Charged Over Child 'Fight Club' Videos
headline.print_headline: New Jersey Daycare Ex-Workers Charged Over Child 'Fight Club' Videos
